product_name: Canoeing in Tennessee - Scenic Trips for All Paddlers
long_description: Enjoy Tennessee's abundance of recreational rivers and lakes with this guide that describes 45 float streams and lakes spread throughout the state. Author: Holly Sherwin. Softcover; 126 pages; 49 black-and-white photos, 48 maps. Alpen Books Press; copyright 2002; second edition. Supplies complete route descriptions, river maps, driving directions, access areas, safety tips, trip-planning advice and outfitter listings.
short_description: Enjoy Tennessee's abundance of recreational rivers and lakes with this guide that describes 45 float streams and lakes spread throughout the state.
